channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-16821] Vectorization: support Explain Analyze in vectorized mode
item.description: Currently, to avoid a branch in the operator inner loop - the runtime stats are only available in non-vector mode.
item.summary: Vectorization: support Explain Analyze in vectorized mode

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12871470 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Why would this patch make Map 1 vectorized (in explain diff)? Also don't understand why would this change operator Ids.

Other than that looks good to me. +1

Map 1 is getting vectorized due to hive.vectorized.use.vector.serde.deserialize=true & the operator-ids change when the vectorizer runs.

I'll do a few more scale tests to make sure that the VRB calls are not accidentally going the parent method.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12903124 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Is this ready to go in?

ashutoshc: one result change that I'm narrowing down - the old q.out looks like the mistake, but then we have a BUG I'm accidentally fixing.

vectorized_multi_output_select.q.out returns (2, 0) instead of (2, 2)
gopalv, the correct result is (2, 2) (see HIVE-17073), probably has to do with the selected array.
Ohk. It will be good to get this in.

jcamachorodriguez: okay, I'm almost sure it has to do with always setting isSelectedInUse then.

I've moved this patch to the head of my qtests pipe and will try to get it fixed today.

-1 overall
